name: KBM Event App Connector
author: Keen.com.mt

sections.description:
The KBM Event App System allows you to display events and booking form’s which allows you to accept bookings for events straight from your own wordpress site.

An account on the KBM is required to be able to use this plugin correctly and obtain the shortcodes required.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the kbm_event_app_connector folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Log into KBM and paste in the generated shortcodes into your content area’s.
sections.faq:
How Do I Register at KBM

A URL will be provided shortly.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added Account to Shortcode so orders can be tracked by the user account

1.0.1

  • Fixed Correct URLs for JS

1.0

  • Initital Release

short_description: KBM Event App Connector is a plugin which allows quick access to event's and performances from the Keen Booking Manager System.
description:

An account on the KBM is required to be able to use this plugin correctly and obtain the shortcodes required.
